content.detailedDescription:
Been interested in ufo's for a while now! and have been watching the sky recently with binoculars. so at about 1:55pm on may 11, 2010 i went out on my back patio and begain scanning the sky, i was looking for about 1 min. when i noticed just about straight above my head about 1,000 to 2,000 feet above(not sure how high it was cause i had nothing to compare it to!) was a black sphere maybe 3 feet across and seem to be a perfect sphere, best way i can describe it was as a black pearl just sitting still in the sky. i watched it sit there not moving for about 5 min. and then it began making little movements to the west stoping at times perfectly still. it didn't seem to get any higher, stayed at same alt. i watched it for about 5 more min. and then it just seemed to vanish, after which i looked for the object for about 15 min. and could never find it again! i would also like to note that since i had binoculars i got a really good look at it and was not a bird, plane or a balloon! so to recap(black sphere,no lights, moved and stopped, lasted for 10min, about 3 feet wide, 1,000 to 2,000 feet high, moving east to west, vanished!!) would have taken a photo but i don't own a camara that is worth a damn!! 

 
and to make sure i answer all your questions posted on the left side of your web page!
1. in lutz fl. at my apartment looking for objects with my binoculars!

2. i first noticed a black haze and then focused in on it and noticed it was a perfect black sphere sitting still in the sky!

3. i thought it was a bird until i focused and seen it had no wings and wasn't moving at first( didn't move at all the first 5 min. i watched it!)

4. black sphere about 3 feet wide, not real sure about size, stationary at first then began making little almost unoticable movements to the west, moving and stoping for 30 to 40 sec. at a time!

5. i first felt interested in the objected thinking i was gonna be able to debunk what i was seeing and after a few moments i began to feel a very erie vibe cause i felt like i was seeing something i wasn't suppose to be seeing, it was like it was trying to hide in plain site! after it was over i was shaking and excited and can not stop thinking about what i seen!

6. after about 10 mins. it just vanished and i could not find it again(looked for about 15 to 20 mins everywhere and could not find it again!)

                     thank you for your time and please let me know if anyone else seen this in my area or anywhere for that matter!! you or anyone that has seen one of these can email me at [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Black orb hovering in sky stationary at times moving from east to west!

content.detailedDescription: While looking outside i saw a translucent silver disk appear at a static location for a moment before before becoming invisible.
content.summary: Translucent silver disk appeared and dissappeared

content.detailedDescription: Large star-like object flying across the sky about the speed of an airplane. when it got about halfway across the horizon (sky) its began to get smaller, and then shot up and dissapeared. the entire event was about one minute in duration.
content.summary: Ufo sighting in franklin, nh by 3 people.

content.detailedDescription: Went out to my car during a short break, and since i have an amature astronomer, i tend to look up in the sky at night a lot.  i noticed a bright object in the sky flying from east to west towards the medford, or airport.  i retrieved my binocular (nikon se 10x42)and focused on this object and quickly determined that it was not a commercial or military craft as it had no running lights.  i watched it for about 10 seconds and realized that i needed a witness and so i ran back inside and got brian and tex who ran out and saw it for about 10 seconds or so.  as we watched it, it changed direction slightly to the right (now travelling southeast) when it suddenly veered upward at great speed and disappeared.  i was first in our companies parking lot when i first saw the object. i new very quickly that i was observing a craft not of conventional design as there were no running lights on the object.  it was quite bright.
content.summary: Bright, oval craft (slight pulsation) flew over my work (radio station)

content.detailedDescription: I was on my lunch break lying down on my back on warm place on the wall near the building where i work. i was actually trying to get some sleep but it wasn't happening. i was wide awake and staring up at the sky. this wall is on the northeast side of a pair of buildings in downtown la. it moved quite smoothly and quietly above the building. it was a round object that was dark grey almost black. it looked like a loose balllon but it was moving forward like a plane. it actually looked like a bowling ball. at one point the side of the object appeared to depress or indent like there was pressure being put on it. as it passed by a smaill light appeared on the tail which got brighter as it passed. when this light was the most bright the object disappeared extremely rapidly. it was just gone. i still don't believe it but i'm sure i saw what i saw.
content.summary: Short passby moving n-s that moved without any noise.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi ! i live in greeley colorado ! i was in my car pulling into my country road driveway when i saw something come out of a cloud. i drove down my dirt road after i backed up and went to see what it was. 

out emerged a shimmering gold egg, it hovered there. it was silent, it was about 25-30 feet long? it then backed up into the cloud after it hovered over me. its gold color shimmering and pulsing..
content.summary: Gold egg.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my three kids were out on vacation. we stoped at thompson springs, utah. it was getting late so we camped in the mouth of the canyon with plans on seeing the petrogyphs the next morning. we set up the tent and when we finished it was dark. my 14 year old was playing with a powerfull green lazer. he was shining it on the canyon walls and up in the air seeing how far it would go. it went milels. he would throw dirt in the air and wave the lazer through it and make cool designs. when we were finished, we started to check out the stars. we were pointing out all the sattlites we could find. 
   than i looked up tward the south and saw two lights a bit bigger than the sattlites (i judged them to be closer to the earth than the sattlites) comming tward each other north ward and mostly vertically (if i stuck my hand up they would be about six inces apart and and closing fast.)  and almost collided i yelled to the kids "look ufo's" and pointed to them. when they almost collided one on the right was slightly northward of the other one and then they zipped apart horizontally. the one on the right zipped off to the west and behind a cloud and the other one tward the east. they were traveling in a very smooth deliberate mannor, much faster and closer than the sattlelites we were watching. i know what we were watching was out of the norm. nothing i know of behaves this way other than ufo's (this is the second sighting in my life thus far.)  the one that went west we didn't see again. we watched the other one on the east side for a while longer and then it went behind a cloud and we could still see it faintly then it disapeared.  i saw another light that i belived to be the same one that came back out of the cloud tward the south again and flashed a couple of times than disappeared. the whole experience lasted for about a miniute. the kids didn't want to go to sleep. they thought that aileins were going to abduct them. i reassured them that i had the gun with me and they would be safe. they felt better and did go to sleep. in the morning we cheked all around for any tracks that were not ours and found none.
content.summary: Two white lights almost collide than zip apart, one eastward one westward.

content.detailedDescription:
I recently captured this picture by my new camera. i was able to zoom in all the way to the left of the sun, because i saw an object in the clouds.
i viewed this in negative color as well and it showed up as if it was a hot object. i didn't know what i caught till i uploaded my digital pictures the next day. i picked up the hobby of doing astro-photography and related, to examine pictures just to see if i would ever see something, because i have seen strange things before. i'm not sure what this object is, but maybe somebody could look at it. i have more pictures from that day, but couldnt see anything else, and havent checked all of them.

i cropped one picture so you can see what i'm seeing, but the other one you can zoom all the way in and see too. not sure what it could be..
content.summary: Rectangle and/or square object near the sun.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my house in windsor getting a glass of milk when something caught my eye outside of the window, it was a bright red light at least 400-500 ft above the ground, as i investigated another bright red light appeared below it. my first reaction was a cell phone tower but there isn't any in that particular direction nor anywhere in close proximity to my house. i started watching these objects 2 hours ago and they haven't moved since the second red orb appeared below it. 
what was so interesting to me was the fact that it is snowing very hard and the visibility is very low. now how in the world would i be able to make out two giant red orbs in the sky miles away from my house?? beats me.
content.summary: Two bright red objects appeared vertically parralell to eachother over windsor co.

content.detailedDescription: First off aliens from other planets are real they are all over our/their? planet. if you are a skeptic then you are a narrow minded barbarian that believes everything you've ever heard. ocassionally i will look for ufos as a recent hobby and have seen some compelling evidence. its amazing what you will see when you look up at the stars all night long night after night. since i am a night owl i have recenty been spending anywhere from 2 to 5 hours looking at the stars each night. i use a combination of a led high powered flash light and a 90 mw green laser pointer to signal or attract anything i can. well i'll speak about the latest sighting. i went to my brothers house in cockeysville maryland i told him about the stuff ive been seeing so he wanted to try too. we went out to a spot away from the street lights of his neighbor hood on a hill and started playing around to attract a ufo my brother decided to shine the laser on a low motionless star far in front of us(he said it looked out of place) then he screams its moving i look and it is true a star that has been sitting there for god knows how long starts moving towards us but to the right of us the object was some what low in the sky and still looks like a star but its moving right after we shined it with the green laser! after about 55 seconds it starts to go transparent but i could still see the light but it went from solid light to see through light to completely invisible and disapearred. he always told me that he has been seeing weird things there at his new apartment but i never really believed him till now i always thought he overacted but this was freaking realllllllllllllll@!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! we were excited at the time it was happening but then stopped caring like it wasnt a big deal i mean what else can we do the event was over there is nothing left to talk about or be excited about plus we have seen much cooler stuff recently and in the past. i would recommend getting a green 90milliwatt laser or better yet more powerful and use morse code and shine stars and make your own signals basicaly draw attention to your self and you will see some stuff if you keep at it. dont shine them at airplanes though that is illegal im pretty sure mufon should bring some equipment out here because the stuff we are seeing is pretty weird and cant be from humans there are tons of different species of aliens out in our or their airspace all the time you just have to get there attention or annoy them enough please call me and send someone out you might just be able to catch something on camera its a hot spot i think maybe it has to do with the mile deep mine which is just one big hole but a mile deep timonium,cockeysville, hunt valley, and monkton, maryland has a lot of activity going on!!!!!!!111 oh the craft moved slowly and steady then gradually faded out into nothing you could tell it was making itself transparent deff not turning off lights solid light then seethrough lights then even more faded light then nothing and also i forgot to mention that there wasnt a cloud in tyhe sky at all
content.summary: Laser induced movement of low star like object the moved and slowlyfaded to invisible

content.detailedDescription: These have been occurring over the past weeks. they look almost like stars but are slightly discolored or over colored and they stay stationary for a while and then you can start seeing a slight movement then speed up and appear to go up away from earth towards upper atmosphere and disappear. the latest happen on monday 5/9/10 it was in the northwest section and i thought it was a star at first but it was way to bright and way to big where you could see it point out at the edges like a star shape slightly registering intensity and stayed staionary with a slight dip down after a 1 1/2 hours towards the horizon. it might have been something orbiting the earth manmade (never saw this before) but it was definitely not a plane or helicopter did not know if anyone else has seen it. to see something that bright in the city is weird because of the light sources from all the buildings and street lights and cars. last night walking the dog at 11:00 p.M. saw another star speed up and looked like it was going straight up into the sky again. is anyone else seeing this? i have a picture with points of reference as to where the stationary bright light was so it can be identified with known stars or anything orbiting the earth if interested or rule that out as a possibility..
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Several mysterious lights upward projectory non blinkinking single lights disappearing like going up towards sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from ohio state university -heading west on a main street (bethel road) towards my house. i was about 15 minutes away from home. it was an overcast sky (no rain at the time but had been raining all day) but in the distance, about a mile ahead and hanging low in the sky was what looked like a star from a distance, almost stationary in the sky. as i got closer i observed that it was actually rows of lights like a set of football stadium lights (and exactly that bright). i was one of the only cars and the road and was surprised to see something that bright in the background of an overcast, dark sky.
the object also appeared to be moving but slowly more to the north west. i thought perhaps i was just mistaking light poles in parking lots (this was in the suburb with strip mall parking lots to my right) but as i drove the object persisted. almost stationary but moving slowly; parallel to my path.
i lost sight of the object as my visibility was obscured by trees but was surprised to see it again as i got closer to my house. at that point i was able to observe it just above a row of apartments (there was no send of engines) -perhaps a three or four miles up, without the lights of other business to obscure the view. this had gone one for just over five minutes when suddenly the object's path switched direction and shape -it shifted to a kind of boomerang shape (except i couldn't make out a distinct shape, just a different configuration of lights). about half of the lights dimmed and about three red blinking lights appeared and it moved quickly in the opposite direction (directly east). i then lost sight of it.

i was a captain in the air force and in addition to working around planes for years, observe planes coming and going in the night sky around my house all the time. i've never seen anything quite like this.
content.summary: Three or four rows of brightly colored lights as bright as a star that changed into a boomerang shape with different colored lights

content.detailedDescription: Caught it out of the corner of my eye.  it fly from west to east. i say it for only perhaps ten seconds.  it was on a decending curve as perhaps a meteriote (sp) would be on.  i went to work and a guy there told me he had seen it as well.  i never believed in this before but it was certainly weird.  i want to know why this was not no the news.
content.summary: Large,approx. sixe of a full size cargo van, bright almost neon green , an orb, with a tail about eignt times the diameter of the shere.

content.detailedDescription: Had just picked up my wife from work at produce row.It was her,our son and i cutting thru downtown houston to hit the h.O.V. lane to i-45 north when i noticed a sphere cutting across the sky.At that time,i told my wife and son to look at it and when they spotted it a southwest jet came in view.The sphere picked up speed and was on a collision course with the jet.As we drove by the spaghetti warehouse to take a right,our view was blocked.When we made our turn and got a look at the area where the jet and sphere were, the jet was gone! i don't know what happened to the jet,but in that span of about 3 seconds it was gone.But the sphere was just sitting there spinning.After we got on the h.O.V. lane we went under i-10 and as we come to the other side of i-10 it was gone.Just wondering if anyone else had seen it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sphere intercepts southwest jet over downtown houston

content.detailedDescription: I have told this story years ago, i had problems i choose not to explain, locked all my photos in my safe, everything was stolen in my house,including my safe but i had a cd in a hidden compartment.  the object i have on video was simply amazing to see it fly east of us and capture all of this on video as well, i think the photos speak for themselves.  never believed in ufo's till that night, my girlfriend as well.  i did some research and yet to find photos that compare to what i have.  i saw air crafts and helicopters going to the object and the ufo dwarfed them in size.  the colors were amazing, at least 5 different colors and 1 red color spinning clockwise when moving.  there also was a mother ship as well, if you want those photos, e mail me that you wish to see them, i'm reluctant to send all the pics as of now!!  nick condos
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Best photograph of a real ufo i've ever seen or heard of, also have a video of the incident, witnessed by myself and a friend,and all over the news the next day!

content.detailedDescription:
I caught this triangle,boomerang,cresent shaped ufo while flying home to chicago from dfw on 5/8/2010. at around 6:23pm cdt i notice a grey silouette of what at first looked like a cigar hanging in the sky. i immediatelly took out my camera out from my carry on and first took photos then i recorded video. i have seen this craft numerous times now, i am pretty sure it is the same craft that was hit by lightning in my other video easter sunday. after the ufo flew away the airplane i was in flew over a nuclear reactor. i had no idea where i was exactly. i believe near the illinois border flying north toward chicago.  

cut and paste link below for video and photos. thank you

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=1wjtfpsvcjs
content.summary: Ufo flying near nuclear reactor 08 may 2010.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 23:20 i went outside to have a cigarette, it was a nice clear evening and the stars were shining. i was looking at one star that seamed to be very bright to the west of me when what i thought was a star next to it shot off heading north east. it moved very fast for about five seconds, i thought it was a shooting star, but then it just stopped. it did not have any flashing lights like an airplane, it just looked like a star. it continued to shine from its new location, i figured i must be really tired and just seeing things, so i put out my cigarette, went inside and went to bed. this morning on the news i heard that the local police had gotten dozens of calls about a large explosion around 23:00 last night. the local radio station(kpqx) reported that the montana air national gaurd had been conducting routine training manuvers  using two f-15 fighters over havre with their afterburners on which created a sonic boom. they also said they would be conducting more training excercises over the next few days and that they were sorry, that they didn't mean to scare anyone and that they would try to make sure it didn't happen again. a major with the mang added that certain atmospheric conditions contributed to the sonic boom reaching the ground. i do not know exactly what it was i saw last night, but i promise you it was not an f-15.
content.summary: Object shot across sky and stopped

content.detailedDescription:
Observed a large brightly lit object in the distance . this object was abright light green in the front of the object and a bright yellow to the rear. the object crossed west to ease in the sky. it appeared to be going down and disappeared over the horizon. this object , at that distance, appeared to be the size of a saucer, the type kids slide on, during the winter. would like to know if any one else reported this incident. i have not seen anyrthing on the news or in the papers



i was on my way to work and had just passed the state police barracks in cheshire ma. i first noticed the object as it appeared from behind a tree in the southern sky. i had no idea what it was .I knew it was not a plane. it was too large and the colors were brilliant. i was wondering if it was going to crash., as it aappeared to be descending. it continued moving east and disappeared behind a mountain range.
content.summary: Brilliantly lit object moving west to east and extremely low in southern sky

content.detailedDescription: My children and i were sitting outside of our motorhome, parked in a parking lot where my husband worked at the time. he was inside. the kids were playing and all of a sudden the large circlular sphere flew above us and off into the no where. it was not far above us and definetly not a plane, it was too low to the ground.  the object flew right above our heads andthen it just disappeared as fast into nowhere. i will never forget this day because it was a quite sunday afternoon and no people were around but us it was a warm day and we were outside.This was on a weekend and no one else was around. i will always remember this object because there were no reports of any rockets being shot off at vanderburg afb.  i fully believe we saw a ufo that day.  i am not exact on dates and time but it did happen.
content.summary: Large round disc shaped object came across sky at a fast speed and low altitude

content.detailedDescription: I went outside last night to let my dogs out. when i opened the door, my attention was brought to the sky where a white round flashy orb was radiating light. as it moved northeast, it turned red and then green and took off. i stared at the sky for about 20 minutes and then saw another white light cross over. the second object didn't take off as fast as the first, but i know it was not an airplane or helicopter. there was no sound.
content.summary: Colored flashes in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were watching the lyrid meteor shower when the ufo fly over our heads. we were lying in a clearing surrounded by redwood trees, so our views of the horizons were obscured. it appeared from the left, flew in a straight line over our heads and disappeared on the right. it was much faster than an airplane, but much slower than a shooting star. it did not glow at all. at first i thought it might be large meteor, and i was was waiting for it explode into a fireball, but then i realized it was not glowing at all.

it was brown, disc-shaped and had undefined edges.

my friend exclaimed, "did you see that?!"

we discussed it but quickly dismissed it as unimportant. that was the weirdest part. we kind of thought it was a cool thing to experience, and we were glad that someone else was there to see it, but it just didn't seem to be that important of an event.
content.summary: Brown, fuzzy edges, moved very fast

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside and looking towards the sky when suddenly i saw a meteor falling.  problem is that it was bright blue.  i stood up because it was so bright i thought there may be an impact.  as i got up i saw the light climbing back into the sky.  straight up. i then thought it was someone shooting fireworks until it started moving abnormally and then started moving off to the north.  at this time i ran into the house and got my wife, who also observed the object as it was moving off in a north, northwest direction.  there were no other color or flashing lights or sounds, and it was very blue in color. the most remarkable thing was the rate of decent and ascent.  it was moving as quickly as a meteor at first until it dropped out of sight behind the houses across the street.  as it rose back into the sky it was moving erratically, then moved off almost straight and level.  i estimate this object to have appeared approximately two miles from my position.

i'm still not sure i believe my own eyes, save for the fact my wife observed the object as well.  it will be interesting to see if anyone else saw anything out there tonight.  i know there were several airplanes in the vicinity and should have been able to see the object.
content.summary: Bright blue light in sky that appeared to be falling, then rose back into sky.

content.detailedDescription: We were on i75 about 2 wweks ago coming back from boca toward naples/ many lites approx 20 hovering and flashing and putting on a lite show from about 1 mile past i75 toll booth to a approx milemarker 70 along the sides of i75/mostly on our left but also a few on our right/ no sound /multiple colors of flashing lites/ perfectly aligned with each other miles apart/ approx 500 to 1000 ft above ground/ no visible means of support / just hoovering in one place/ made the same trip a week later and only approx 6 of the same spotted/ in summer of 2005 while driving back thru i75, my wife saw an actual ufo it was taking off from the center median of i75.  it was the bright white light that she took notice to as it was rising upward. it was grayish in color. the landing gear looked like claws closing up underneath the vessel. as it closed it looked like a saucer with a bright white light in the center. it moved very fast at at upward slope. she watched it as long as she could from her left side door mirror until it disappeared. it was a matter of maybe 20 seconds as she watched in shock.
content.summary: Lites along i75.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my break from work, outside eating my lunch. this was at night during graveyard shift. i looked up into the sky and admired the stars at night. i saw several different stars, and one that i thought was mars. i told myself, wow mars is bright tonight. i ate my lunch, and then lied on the ground because of being tired while looking up at the sky. the star that i thought was mars looked as if it was moving. my eyes gazed upon it, and it was moving in a very unpredictable zig zag motion. i thought that it may be a airplane, but airplanes don't stop nor zig zag as they would crash. i thought maybe a helicopter, but choppers do not look like mars nor be that high up into the sky. the star would zig zag, stop in mid flight, and then turn in the complete opposite direction. the star was fixed in the sky while i was eating, but the minute i laid on the ground, it started moving. it seemed to know that i noticed it. it would sometimes circle, go back and forth, and then stop in midflight. no sound, nor any sign of any fuel propultion system.

as i was watching it more closely, i thought well maybe a satelite. but an orbiting satalite does not zig zag. i admired it for a little while, but then i had to return to work.  on my second break, the sky was more hazy and all of the stars could not be seen. i laid back down again, and saw another star. this star was fixed, but did show up through the haze. i be darned, that star the started doing the same motion. i laughed at myself, and thought why do i make stars move. i shined my cell phone light up at it, but did not seem to get any response. the star did not look like mars on the second break. it looked like a normal star light years away. but as this star started dancing, it got the mars orange tint to it again.

in my opinion, it was was either in space or at the edge of earth's atmosphere. i think it was a technology that we do not have that i am aware of. looking up into the sky, nobody would have noticed it at all. it fit into the whole sky. i would not have noticed either, until it started moving.

when i came to my belief that it was something from space, i thought that they were using it to see what us earthlings are doing. it wanted to be under cover. i think people who look for ufo's expect to see lights, triangles, or saucers, but does not think a star would be a ufo.

it was like a secret camera fixed to watch us in our normal day to day lives. the spies new that if the came in their ship, then there cover would be broken. it reminded me of like a probe driod from star wars.
i am a believer in alien life way before this event. 

i admire bill birnes and the ufo hunters. i have a bachelor's degree in psychology, and i am aware of all of the hullicinations and sometimes mind tricks. but this was as clear as a bell.

so it was no suprise to me to see a real extrordinary event. this was my first ufo sighting, so it confirms in my mind that we are not alone.
content.summary: I saw a moving star.

content.detailedDescription:
I observed a bright white object traveling very slowly across the sky. it was nearly straight up above near me. there is a photo of a sighting that remains me exactly of what i saw from a report in new jersey on today's date.

the light moved very slowly from west to east, and a plane actually flew underneath it. i have seen the iss and several satellites before, but this object not only flew very slowly it also changed direction slightly from east to west to east to southeast. 

at first glance it looked like a star but you could clearly tell it was moving. i lost sight of the object i believe due to a building, but it either disappeared or sped off as i attempted to take a picture with my phone (it was too high up to get a picture). 

thanks.
content.summary: Very high, star-like object, too slow to be a satellite or iss

content.detailedDescription:
On may 10 2010, at aproximate 10:51pm eastern time, i was taking my dog out in company of my mother, when i looked up in the sky. clear night, no clouds in the sky, cold night no wind, no bright lights around our house, pa northeastern, near the backmountain area),and then we saw this particularly big bright round light, coming about as high as an airplane, but with no sound at all, just floating in the sky, it was floating for a few seconds more and then it faded until it dissapeared above our heads. i dont have an idea what it was.
i got nervous but we didnt react that much because we dont have an idea what that thing was, never had an experience like that before.
content.summary: Bright round large light floating instead of flying like a plane.

content.detailedDescription:
~a close friend and i were outside smoking  cigarettes when a bright object in the sky caught our attention.  this was at approximately 20:50 est.  the object appeared to be just a very bright star at first-- which was what caught our attention.  it was later determined to be moving, however, after a closer study.
~a few points to supplement this assertion are: 
1) object was eclipsed momentarily by tree limbs at several points and but would always return to open sky, as perceived from our position in front of my house. 
2) it flickered as it moved back and forth along the horizon and in circular or arc-shaped, sweeping motions to and fro.  
3) the object's light would dim after it reached the peak of its arc-maneuver and hence begin to move in the opposite direction, and would brighten considerably when facing us. the path of the light's beam could be seen when facing from side to side. 
4) once in awhile, the light would juke every which way and at odd combinations of sharp angles, in short bursts of incredible speed. 
~it at first seemed to be hovering over one point but we found the object to be maneuvering away from our position, as it eventually disappeared over the horizon. we were both compelled by strange, anxious feelings for the duration of the sighting.
~ we repeatedly had to back up to keep the object in our view and actually had to move to my second-story balcony for the last ten minutes of the event, as if hypnotized to stare at this weird light until it could no longer be viewed. this was at approximately 21:19.
~ i attempted to signal the object with a mag-light-- in numeric combinations of numbers counting down from three-- but to no avail.  at one point, i attempted to use the 75-watt bulbs in the balcony lights as well. but still, the object retreated.
~i judged the object to be three miles away at first and was gone forty minutes later, still moving  in the direction of the delaware water gap. this thing was very bright and very noticeable; i would find it hard to believe that nobody else saw it besides the two of us.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange light in the sky...

content.detailedDescription:
4/09/2010 at approximately 9pm outside in a southwestern arizona city, 2 people observed an unknown occurrence.  it was a warm, cloudless, still night and my son and i were sitting in our backyard, as my son was reclined on a bench looking up at the night sky.  all of a sudden my son exclaimed that he  saw what looked like a soft white single color ribbon, flying silently across the sky, it was perhaps 45 degrees off the eastern horizon, flying south to north and within a few seconds quickly faded as it moved across the sky. the distinct shape never changed, and there were no distinguishable individual lights that he could see.  shortly after that we caught sight of another formation exactly like the first sighting flying south to north directly overhead, silently, and at approximately 80 degrees off the horizon.  it was a somewhat translucent, solid light, with the curved leading edge the primary visible structure.  it was a distinctly curved object, (perhaps boomerang shaped)-  that was only visible for a few brief seconds before fading away.
we caught a third shape of the same formation shortly after the second.   it was in the same location the first sighting was and faded quickly.  the object seemed very large, quiet with a faint white,  luminescent light emanating from it.  each sighting the object looked like it was at a different elevation in the nighttime sky, perfectly formed. and although we saw 3 distinct things fly through the sky that night above us, they were separate and exactly the same shape, although different sizes.  it had a definate edge all around the curved shape.  it was as if we were seeing something that was almost completely invisible, except for the curved leading edge of the crescent.  i don't know how large the objects were, but they must have been very large and high in altitude, because we lost sight of them in a matter of seconds.  we are located in the middle of a medium-sized city, lots of lights all around us.  two military bases are located in the vicinity. (mcas and army testing ground).
content.summary: 3 large, silent, curved objects moving south to north

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at my computer with a friend (who was working on his laptop) in my bedroom at home.  my apartment is located on the 19th floor of my building and my window has a pretty good view of downtown n.Y.C., so i'm usally looking out the window.  i also have a great view over the hudson river into new jersey, and i costantly looking into the sky.  on this day it was very nice out with the sky clear with no clouds so i had my windows open for fresh air.  while working on the computer, i took a minute away from the screen to glance out the window. while looking out, i noticed two parallel lines of smoke in the sky above some buildings about 2-3 miles from where i am.  at first, i shrugged it off as clouds in the sky or chimney smoke.  then as i thought about it for a second, i realized that it was a hot day, there shouldn't be any buildings running their heating systems, and at the same time i looked again there were no other clouds in the sky.  that's when i looked more clearly and noticed that the objects weren't clouds or smoke.  one of the objects started moving away from the parallel formation it was originally in and started drifting away to the left of the other object and at a greater speed.  the objects were very far away, but i could still see their outline in the backgrond of the sky.  i then told my friend to take a look to see if he could figure out what it was as i began to grab for my digital video recorder.  i figured i could see the objects better with the zoom on the camera.  at first my friend couldn't see the objects, so i turned on my camera and zoomed in on the object in the sky that was closer in the camera view.  while i was doing this, the object that started to drift away at first was now very far from its original position near the other object, and was very far and high in the sky going in the direction towards space, away from the earth.  i began to record the other object, which was moving in at its original speed and direction, trying to maintain the focus on it while zooming in.  my friend looked at the digital display on my camera and could now see the object as well, but couldn't determine what it was.  for the next few minutes, i tried to keep the focus on the object trying to get a closer view with the zoom, but i kept on losing the focus.  while continueing to record, the object i was filming seemed to now change its direction as well, and was now drifting to the left, following the path as the other object, but not as fast.  i could see that the object was moving at a high speed, but it was far and high in the sky.  it was leaving a small smoke trail behind it that was reflecting the glow of the setting sun.  i zoomed-in with the camera as best as i could, until i captured the object with the best stil hand i could hold.  the objects then disappeared into the sky where i couldn't see them any more.  i've seen jet planes, and other things in the sky that i could distinguish before.  this object had no blinking lights, and was almost transparent in the sky.  i figured it could have been a missle of some sort, but that night, there were no reports of any nasa or military events.  i live in new york city, and since the events of 911, i would've thought if there were any activities in the skies above new york, the people would be very aware of things in our immediate atmosphere.  anyway,  i have the original footage, but no way to upload it online.  i've shown it to a few close friends and they can't figure what it could be.  i welcome your expert opinions, and will allow you to view the the recorded event.  feel free to contact me as soon as possible, my information is provided above.  thank you for your time, and hope to hear from you soon.
content.summary: I recorded two objects flying across the sky at very high speed during a clear day, from my 19th floor bedroom window.

content.detailedDescription: Been seeing a star like object every night so far insouth jersey area, but its not a star, way to close and its moving and pulsating different colors, bright white bluish even flickers redish at times, must be some type of advanced propulsion system.  makes no noise.
content.summary: Looked like a star but way closer, and it was moving
